TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LabelEditEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供有关 和 事件的数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个指定的索引和标题的和用户编辑后的标题。A specifies the index and caption of a and the caption after it has been edited by the user. 此类还提供属性。This class also provides a property. 可以使用此属性在事件处理程序以阻止用户编辑标签。You can use this property in a event handler to prevent the user from editing the label. 此外可以使用它在事件处理程序可撤消更改，返回标签到其原始值。You can also use it in an event handler to revert the change, returning the label it to its original value. 当你想要提交更改前验证用户输入时，这很有用。This is useful when you want to validate user input before committing the change. > [!NOTE] > 因为事件发生之前就会提交，调用标签编辑此事件的处理程序中的方法将对使用原始值的项进行排序。Because the event takes place before the label edit is committed, calling the method in a handler for this event will sort the item using the original value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何处理事件并使用和属性。The following code example demonstrates handling the event and using the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在一个窗体，其中包含名为控件`ListView1`和填充至少 3 个项。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control named `ListView1` and populated with at least 3 items. 请确保所有事件都都具有其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView3/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView3/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView3/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数引发或在运行时，若要指定在一个列表项事件编辑。You can use this constructor when raising the or event at run time to specify a list item in the to edit. 构造函数还可以指定与标签关联的新文本。The constructor also enables you to specify the new text associated with the label of the .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应取消对 的标签所作的更改。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether changes made to the label of the should be canceled.

value.span: 如果应取消 标签的编辑操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the edit operation of the label for the should be canceled; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性可取消的标签所作的更改并将其还原到其原始文本。You can use this property to cancel changes made to the label of a and revert it to its original text. 使用此属性以防止项的标题更改为一个值，不符合应用程序的要求。Use this property to prevent an item's caption from being changed to a value that does not meet your application's requirements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何处理事件并使用和属性。The following code example demonstrates handling the event and using the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请在一个窗体，其中包含一个 ListView 控件名为 ListView1 和填充至少 3 个项中粘贴以下代码。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a ListView control named ListView1 and populated with at least 3 items. 请确保所有事件都都具有其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView3/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView3/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView3/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#463](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#463)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#463](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#463)]
